BBEX3.A.FJD.EUR.CM.AC.A04: Exchange rates for the euro in Fiji / FJD 1 = EUR ... (middle)
Source: Since May 2013: Bank South Pacific, Suva2006 - April 2013: Australia and New Zealand Banking Group (ANZ), Suva1999 - 2005: Westpac Banking Corporation, Suva
Methodology: Calculated on the basis of month-end buying and selling rates.

Comment on 2009: On 15 April 2009, the Fiji dollar was devalued. We recorded the following exchange rates (buying/selling).  14 April 2009: FJD 1 = EUR 0.4346 / 0.4226  15 April 2009: FJD 1 = EUR 0.3496 / 0.3376  Calculated devaluation: 19.8% (middle rate).
